aether.name: Aether
aether.description: A traveler from another world who had their only kin taken away, forcing them to embark on a journey to find The Seven.

albedo.name: Albedo
albedo.title: Kreideprinz
albedo.description: A genius known as the Kreideprinz, he is the Chief Alchemist and Captain of the Investigation Team of the Knights of Favonius.

aloy.name: Aloy
aloy.title: Savior From Another World
aloy.description: Formerly an outcast, now a hunter of unparalleled skill. Ready to do the right thing at any time.

amber.name: Amber
amber.title: Gliding Champion
amber.description: Always energetic and full of life, Amber's the best — albeit only — Outrider of the Knights of Favonius.

barbara.name: Barbara
barbara.title: Shining Idol
barbara.description: Every citizen of Mondstadt adores Barbara. She learned the word "idol" from a magazine.

beidou.name: Beidou
beidou.title: Uncrowned Lord of the Ocean
beidou.description: Captain of her crew, The Crux. She's quite an unbound and forthright woman.

bennett.name: Bennett
bennett.title: Trial by Fire
bennett.description: A good-natured adventurer from Mondstadt who's unfortunately extremely unlucky.

chongyun.name: Chongyun
chongyun.title: Frozen Ardor
chongyun.description: A young exorcist from a family of exorcists. He does everything he can to suppress his abundance of yang energy.

diluc.name: Diluc
diluc.title: The Dark Side of Dawn
diluc.description: The tycoon of a winery empire in Mondstadt, unmatched in every possible way.

diona.name: Diona
diona.title: Kätzlein Cocktail
diona.description: A young lady who has inherited trace amounts of non-human blood. She is the incredibly popular bartender of the Cat's Tail tavern.

eula.name: Eula
eula.title: Dance of the Shimmering Wave
eula.description: The Spindrift Knight, a scion of the old aristocracy, and the Captain of the Knights of Favonius Reconnaissance Company. The reason for which a descendant of the ancient nobles might join the Knights remains a great mystery in Mondstadt to this very day.

fischl.name: Fischl
fischl.title: Prinzessin der Verurteilung!
fischl.description: A mysterious girl who calls herself "Prinzessin der Verurteilung" and travels with a night raven named Oz.

cv.japanese: 内田真礼 & 増谷康紀

ganyu.name: Ganyu
ganyu.title: Plenilune Gaze
ganyu.description: The secretary at Yuehai Pavilion. The blood of the qilin, an illuminated beast, flows within her veins.

hutao.name: Hu Tao
hutao.title: Fragrance in Thaw
hutao.description: The 77th Director of the Wangsheng Funeral Parlor. She took over the business at a rather young age.

jean.name: Jean
jean.title: Dandelion Knight
jean.description: The righteous and rigorous Dandelion Knight, and Acting Grand Master of Mondstadt's Knights of Favonius.

kaedeharakazuha.name: Kaedehara Kazuha
kaedeharakazuha.title: Scarlet Leaves Pursue Wild Waves
kaedeharakazuha.description: A wandering samurai from Inazuma who is currently with Liyue's Crux Fleet. A gentle and carefree soul whose heart hides a great many burdens from the past.

kaeya.name: Kaeya
kaeya.title: Frostwind Swordsman
kaeya.description: An accomplished swordsman and a strategic thinker in the Knights of Favonius, rumored to hail from beyond Mondstadt.

kamisatoayaka.name: Kamisato Ayaka
kamisatoayaka.title: Frostflake Heron
kamisatoayaka.description: Daughter of the Yashiro Commission's Kamisato Clan. Dignified and elegant, as well as wise and strong.

keqing.name: Keqing
keqing.title: Driving Thunder
keqing.description: The Yuheng of the Liyue Qixing. Keqing has much to say about Rex Lapis's unilateral approach to policymaking in Liyue — but in truth, gods admire skeptics such as her quite a lot.

klee.name: Klee
klee.title: Fleeing Sunlight
klee.description: An explosives expert and a regular at the Knights of Favonius's confinement room. Also known as Fleeing Sunlight.

kujousara.name: Kujou Sara
kujousara.title: Crowfeather Kaburaya
kujousara.description: A general of the Tenryou Commission. Bold, decisive, and skilled in battle.

lisa.name: Lisa
lisa.title: Witch of Purple Rose
lisa.description: The languid but knowledgeable Librarian of the Knights of Favonius, deemed by Sumeru Academia to be their most distinguished graduate in the past two centuries.

lumine.name: Lumine
lumine.description: A traveler from another world who had their only kin taken away, forcing them to embark on a journey to find The Seven.

mona.name: Mona
mona.title: Astral Reflection
mona.description: A mysterious young astrologer who proclaims herself to be "Astrologist Mona Megistus," and who possesses abilities to match the title. Erudite, but prideful.

ningguang.name: Ningguang
ningguang.title: Eclipsing Star
ningguang.description: The Tianquan of the Liyue Qixing. Her wealth is unsurpassed in all of Teyvat.

noelle.name: Noelle
noelle.title: Chivalric Blossom
noelle.description: A maid who faithfully serves the Knights of Favonius. She dreams of joining their ranks someday.

qiqi.name: Qiqi
qiqi.title: Icy Resurrection
qiqi.description: An apprentice and herb gatherer at Bubu Pharmacy. An undead with a bone-white complexion, she seldom has much in the way of words or emotion.

raidenshogun.name: Raiden Shogun
raidenshogun.title: Plane of Euthymia
raidenshogun.description: Her Excellency, the Almighty Narukami Ogosho, who promised the people of Inazuma an unchanging Eternity.

razor.name: Razor
razor.title: Wolf Boy
razor.description: A boy who lives among the wolves in Wolvendom of Mondstadt, away from human civilization. As agile as lightning.

rosaria.name: Rosaria
rosaria.title: Thorny Benevolence
rosaria.description: A sister of the church, though you wouldn't know it if it weren't for her attire. Known for her sharp, cold words and manner, she often works alone.

sangonomiyakokomi.name: Sangonomiya Kokomi
sangonomiyakokomi.title: Pearl of Wisdom
sangonomiyakokomi.description: The Divine Priestess of Watatsumi Island. All of the island's affairs are at this young lady's fingertips.

sayu.name: Sayu
sayu.title: Mujina Ninja
sayu.description: A pint-sized ninja attached to the Shuumatsuban, who always seems sleep-deprived.

sucrose.name: Sucrose
sucrose.title: Harmless Sweetie
sucrose.description: An alchemist filled with curiosity about all things. She researches bio-alchemy.

tartaglia.name: Tartaglia
tartaglia.title: Childe
tartaglia.description: No. 11 of The Harbingers, also known as "Childe." His name is highly feared on the battlefield.

thoma.name: Thoma
thoma.title: Protector From Afar
thoma.description: The Kamisato Clan's housekeeper. A well-known "fixer" in Inazuma.

venti.name: Venti
venti.title: Windborne Bard
venti.description: One of the many bards of Mondstadt, who freely wanders the city's streets and alleys.

xiangling.name: Xiangling
xiangling.title: Exquisite Delicacy
xiangling.description: A renowned chef from Liyue. She's extremely passionate about cooking and excels at making her signature hot and spicy dishes.

xiao.name: Xiao
xiao.title: Vigilant Yaksha
xiao.description: A yaksha adeptus who defends Liyue. Also heralded as the "Conqueror of Demons" and "Vigilant Yaksha."

xingqiu.name: Xingqiu
xingqiu.title: Juvenile Galant
xingqiu.description: A young man carrying a longsword who is frequently seen at book booths. He has a chivalrous heart and yearns for justice and fairness for all.

xinyan.name: Xinyan
xinyan.title: Blazing Riff
xinyan.description: Liyue's sole rock 'n' roll musician. She rebels against ossified prejudices using her music and passionate singing.

yanfei.name: Yanfei
yanfei.title: Wise Innocence
yanfei.description: A well-known legal adviser active in Liyue Harbor. A brilliant young lady in whose veins runs the blood of an illuminated beast.

yoimiya.name: Yoimiya
yoimiya.title: Frolicking Flames
yoimiya.description: Owner of Naganohara Fireworks. Known as "Queen of the Summer Festival," she excels in her craft of creating fireworks that symbolize people's hopes and dreams.

zhongli.name: Zhongli
zhongli.title: Vago Mundo
zhongli.description: A mysterious expert contracted by the Wangsheng Funeral Parlor. Extremely knowledgeable in all things.

akuoumaru.name: Akuoumaru
akuoumaru.description: The beloved sword of the legendary "Akuou." The blade is huge and majestic, but is surprisingly easy to wield.
akuoumaru.effect: For every point of the entire party's combined maximum Energy capacity, the Elemental Burst DMG of the character equipping this weapon is increased by {0}. A maximum of {1} increased Elemental Burst DMG can be achieved this way.

ascend1.name: Coral Branch of a Distant Sea

ascend2.name: Jeweled Branch of a Distant Sea

ascend3.name: Jeweled Branch of a Distant Sea

ascend4.name: Jade Branch of a Distant Sea

ascend5.name: Jade Branch of a Distant Sea

ascend6.name: Golden Branch of a Distant Sea

alleyhunter.name: Alley Hunter
alleyhunter.description: An intricate, opulent longbow. It once belonged to a gentleman thief who was never caught.
alleyhunter.effect: While the character equipped with this weapon is in the party but not on the field, their DMG increases by {0} every second up to a max of {1}. When the character is on the field for more than 4s, the aforementioned DMG buff decreases by {2} per second until it reaches 0%.

amberbead.name: Amber Bead
amberbead.description: A catalyst carved out of amber that gains a warm halo under the sun.
amberbead.effect: Normal Attack hits increase all Elemental DMG by {0} for 6s. Max 2 stacks.

amenomakageuchi.name: Amenoma Kageuchi
amenomakageuchi.description: A blade custom made for a famed samurai who could strike down a tengu warrior, known for their incredible agility, in midair.
amenomakageuchi.effect: After casting an Elemental Skill, gain 1 Succession Seed. This effect can be triggered once every 5s. The Succession Seed lasts for 30s. Up to 3 Succession Seeds may exist simultaneously. After using an Elemental Burst, all Succession Seeds are consumed and after 2s, the character regenerates {0} Energy for each seed consumed.

ascend1.name: Coral Branch of a Distant Sea

ascend2.name: Jeweled Branch of a Distant Sea

ascend3.name: Jeweled Branch of a Distant Sea

ascend4.name: Jade Branch of a Distant Sea

ascend5.name: Jade Branch of a Distant Sea

ascend6.name: Golden Branch of a Distant Sea

amosbow.name: Amos' Bow
amosbow.description: An extremely ancient bow that has retained its power despite its original master being long gone. It draws power from everyone and everything in the world, and the further away you are from that which your heart desires, the more powerful it is.
amosbow.effect: Increases Normal and Charged Attack DMG by {0}. After a Normal or Charged Attack is fired, DMG dealt increases by a further {1} every 0.1s the arrow is in the air for up to 5 times.

apprenticesnotes.name: Apprentice's Notes
apprenticesnotes.description: Notes left behind by a top student. Many useful spells are listed, and the handwriting is beautiful.

aquilafavonia.name: Aquila Favonia
aquilafavonia.description: The soul of the Knights of Favonius. Millennia later, it still calls on the winds of swift justice to vanquish all evil — just like the last heroine who wielded it.
aquilafavonia.effect: ATK is increased by {0}. Triggers on taking DMG: the soul of the Falcon of the West awakens, holding the banner of resistance aloft, regenerating HP equal to {1} of ATK and dealing {2} of ATK as DMG to surrounding opponents. This effect can only occur once every 15s.

beginnersprotector.name: Beginner's Protector
beginnersprotector.description: A polearm as straight as a flag pole. Well suited to most combat situations, it has an imposing presence when swung.

blackcliffagate.name: Blackcliff Agate
blackcliffagate.description: A mysterious catalyst made of a material known as "blackcliff." It has an ominous crimson glow that seems to pulse in synchronization with the tremors from deep within the earth.
blackcliffagate.effect: After defeating an enemy, ATK is increased by {0} for 30s. This effect has a maximum of 3 stacks, and the duration of each stack is independent of the others.

blackclifflongsword.name: Blackcliff Longsword
blackclifflongsword.description: A sword made of a material known as "blackcliff." It has a dark crimson glow on its black blade.
blackclifflongsword.effect: After defeating an opponent, ATK is increased by {0} for 30s. This effect has a maximum of 3 stacks, and the duration of each stack is independent of the others.

blackcliffpole.name: Blackcliff Pole
blackcliffpole.description: A weapon made of blackcliff and aerosiderite. There is a dark crimson glow on its cold black sheen.
blackcliffpole.effect: After defeating an enemy, ATK is increased by {0} for 30s. This effect has a maximum of 3 stacks, and the duration of each stack is independent of the others.

blackcliffslasher.name: Blackcliff Slasher
blackcliffslasher.description: An extremely sturdy greatsword from the Blackcliff Forge. It has a dark crimson color from the blade to pommel.
blackcliffslasher.effect: After defeating an enemy, ATK is increased by {0} for 30s. This effect has a maximum of 3 stacks, and the duration of each stack is independent of the others.

blackcliffwarbow.name: Blackcliff Warbow
blackcliffwarbow.description: A bow made of blackcliff that features extremely sturdy bow limbs. It requires an archer with a strong bow arm to use.
blackcliffwarbow.effect: After defeating an enemy, ATK is increased by {0} for 30s. This effect has a maximum of 3 stacks, and the duration of each stack is independent of the others.

blacktassel.name: Black Tassel
blacktassel.description: An exceptionally powerful polearm that also offers a simple but elegant solution to the issue of the easily stained white tassel.

bloodtaintedgreatsword.name: Bloodtainted Greatsword
bloodtaintedgreatsword.description: A steel sword that is said to have been coated with dragon blood, rendering it invulnerable to damage. This effect is not extended to its wielder, however.
bloodtaintedgreatsword.effect: Increases DMG against opponents affected by Pyro or Electro by {0}.

compoundbow.name: Compound Bow
compoundbow.description: An exotic metallic bow from a distant land. Though extremely difficult to maintain, it is easy to nock and fires with tremendous force.
compoundbow.effect: Normal Attack and Charged Attack hits increase ATK by {0} and Normal ATK SPD by {1} for 6s. Max 4 stacks. Can only occur once every 0.3s.

coolsteel.name: Cool Steel
coolsteel.description: A reliable steel-forged weapon that serves as a testament to the great adventures of its old master.
coolsteel.effect: Increases DMG against opponents affected by Hydro or Cryo by {0}.

crescentpike.name: Crescent Pike
crescentpike.description: An exotic weapon with an extremely long blade on the top and a crescent blade at the bottom. It found its way into Liyue through foreign traders. With practice, it can deal heavy damage.
crescentpike.effect: After picking up an Elemental Orb/Particle, Normal and Charged Attacks deal additional DMG equal to {0} of ATK for 5s.

darkironsword.name: Dark Iron Sword
darkironsword.description: A perfectly ordinary iron sword, just slightly darker than most.
darkironsword.effect: Upon causing an Overloaded, Superconduct, Electro-Charged, or an Electro-infused Swirl reaction, ATK is increased by {0} for 12s.

deathmatch.name: Deathmatch
deathmatch.description: A sharp crimson polearm that was once a gladiator's priceless treasure. Its awl has been stained by the blood of countless beasts and men.
deathmatch.effect: If there are at least 2 opponents nearby, ATK is increased by {0} and DEF is increased by {1}. If there are fewer than 2 opponents nearby, ATK is increased by {2}.

debateclub.name: Debate Club
debateclub.description: A handy club made of fine steel. The most persuasive line of reasoning in any debater's arsenal.
debateclub.effect: After using an Elemental Skill, on hit, Normal and Charged Attacks deal additional DMG equal to {0} of ATK in a small AoE. Effect lasts 15s. DMG can only occur once every 3s.

dodocotales.name: Dodoco Tales
dodocotales.description:
A children's book filled with childish short stories at which one cannot help but laugh.
Even those readers who have long reached adulthood cannot help but be absorbed by the innocent, naive little adventures portrayed within.
dodocotales.effect: Normal Attack hits on opponents increase Charged Attack DMG by {0} for 6s. Charged Attack hits on opponents increase ATK by {1} for 6s.

dragonsbane.name: Dragon's Bane
dragonsbane.description: A polearm decorated with an entwining golden dragon. Light and sharp, this weapon may very well kill dragons with ease.
dragonsbane.effect: Increases DMG against opponents affected by Hydro or Pyro by {0}.

dragonspinespear.name: Dragonspine Spear
dragonspinespear.description: A spear created from the fang of a dragon. It is oddly warm to the touch.
dragonspinespear.effect: Hitting an opponent with Normal and Charged Attacks has a {0} chance of forming and dropping an Everfrost Icicle above them, dealing AoE DMG equal to {1} of ATK. Opponents affected by Cryo are instead dealt DMG equal to {2} of ATK. Can only occur once every 10s.

dullblade.name: Dull Blade
dullblade.description: Youthful dreams and the thrill of adventure. If this isn't enough, then make it up with valiance.

ebonybow.name: Ebony Bow
ebonybow.description: A longbow made of ebony wood with stiffer limbs than ordinary bows. It is also a far more powerful weapon.
ebonybow.effect: Increases DMG against mechanoid Ruin opponents by {0}.

elegyfortheend.name: Elegy for the End
elegyfortheend.description: A bow as lovely as any bard's lyre, its arrows pierce the heart like a lamenting sigh.
elegyfortheend.effect: A part of the "Millennial Movement" that wanders amidst the winds. Increases Elemental Mastery by {0}. When the Elemental Skills or Elemental Bursts of the character wielding this weapon hit opponents, that character gains a Sigil of Remembrance. This effect can be triggered once every 0.2s and can be triggered even if said character is not on the field. When you possess 4 Sigils of Remembrance, all of them will be consumed and all nearby party members will obtain the "Millennial Movement: Farewell Song" effect for 12s. "Millennial Movement: Farewell Song" increases Elemental Mastery by {1} and increases ATK by {2}. Once this effect is triggered, you will not gain Sigils of Remembrance for 20s. Of the many effects of the "Millennial Movement," buffs of the same type will not stack.

emeraldorb.name: Emerald Orb
emeraldorb.description: A catalyst carved out of the hard jade from Jueyun Karst north of Liyue. Small, light, and durable, it is known more colloquially as the "jade ball."
emeraldorb.effect: Upon causing a Vaporize, Electro-Charged, Frozen, or a Hydro-infused Swirl reaction, increases ATK by {0} for 12s.

engulfinglightning.name: Engulfing Lightning
engulfinglightning.description: A naginata used to "cut grass." Any army that stands before this weapon will probably be likewise cut down...
engulfinglightning.effect: ATK increased by {0} of Energy Recharge over the base 100%. You can gain a maximum bonus of {1} ATK. Gain {2} Energy Recharge for 12s after using an Elemental Burst.

everlastingmoonglow.name: Everlasting Moonglow
everlastingmoonglow.description: A string of lovely jasper from the deep sea. It shines with a pure radiance like that of the moon, and just as ever-distant.
everlastingmoonglow.effect: Healing Bonus increased by {0}, Normal Attack DMG is increased by {1} of the Max HP of the character equipping this weapon. For 12s after using an Elemental Burst, Normal Attacks that hit opponents will restore 0.6 Energy. Energy can be restored this way once every 0.1s.

ascend1.name: Coral Branch of a Distant Sea

ascend2.name: Jeweled Branch of a Distant Sea

ascend3.name: Jeweled Branch of a Distant Sea

ascend4.name: Jade Branch of a Distant Sea

ascend5.name: Jade Branch of a Distant Sea

ascend6.name: Golden Branch of a Distant Sea

eyeofperception.name: Eye of Perception
eyeofperception.description: A dim black glaze pearl that is said to have the power to read the purity of one's heart.
eyeofperception.effect: Normal and Charged Attacks have a 50% chance to fire a Bolt of Perception, dealing {0} ATK as DMG. This bolt can bounce between opponents a maximum of 4 times. This effect can occur once every {1}.

favoniuscodex.name: Favonius Codex
favoniuscodex.description: A secret tome that belonged to the scholars of the Knights of Favonius. It describes the logic and power of elements and matter.
favoniuscodex.effect: CRIT Hits have a {0} chance to generate a small amount of Elemental Particles, which will regenerate 6 Energy for the character. Can only occur once every {1}.

favoniusgreatsword.name: Favonius Greatsword
favoniusgreatsword.description: A heavy ceremonial sword of the Knights of Favonius. It channels elemental power easily and is highly destructive.
favoniusgreatsword.effect: CRIT Hits have a {0} chance to generate a small amount of Elemental Particles, which will regenerate 6 Energy for the character. Can only occur once every {1}.

favoniuslance.name: Favonius Lance
favoniuslance.description: A polearm made in the style of the Knights of Favonius. Its shaft is straight, and its tip flows lightly like the wind.
favoniuslance.effect: CRIT Hits have a {0} chance to generate a small amount of Elemental Particles, which will regenerate 6 Energy for the character. Can only occur once every {1}.

favoniussword.name: Favonius Sword
favoniussword.description: A standard-issue longsword of the Knights of Favonius. When you're armed with this agile and sharp weapon, channeling the power of the elements has never been so easy!
favoniussword.effect: CRIT Hits have a {0} chance to generate a small amount of Elemental Particles, which will regenerate 6 Energy for the character. Can only occur once every {1}.

favoniuswarbow.name: Favonius Warbow
favoniuswarbow.description: A standard-issue recurve bow of the Knights of Favonius. Only the best archers can unleash its full potential.
favoniuswarbow.effect: CRIT Hits have a {0} chance to generate a small amount of Elemental Particles, which will regenerate 6 Energy for the character. Can only occur once every {1}.

ferrousshadow.name: Ferrous Shadow
ferrousshadow.description: A replica of the famed sword of Arundolyn, the Lion of Light. Feel the power of a legendary hero as you hold this sword in your hand! Imagine yourself as the great warrior himself! Note: Daydreaming not recommended in live combat.
ferrousshadow.effect: When HP falls below {0}, increases Charged Attack DMG by {1} and Charged Attacks become harder to interrupt.

festeringdesire.name: Festering Desire
festeringdesire.description: A creepy straight sword that almost seems to yearn for life. It drips with a shriveling venom that could even corrupt a mighty dragon.
festeringdesire.effect: Increases Elemental Skill DMG by {0} and Elemental Skill CRIT Rate by {1}.

filletblade.name: Fillet Blade
filletblade.description: A sharp filleting knife. The blade is long, thin, and incredibly sharp.
filletblade.effect: On hit, has a 50% chance to deal {0} ATK DMG to a single target. Can only occur once every {1}.

freedomsworn.name: Freedom-Sworn
freedomsworn.description: A straight sword, azure as antediluvian song, and as keen as the oaths of freedom taken in the Land of Wind.
freedomsworn.effect: A part of the "Millennial Movement" that wanders amidst the winds. Increases DMG by {0}. When the character wielding this weapon triggers Elemental Reactions, they gain a Sigil of Rebellion. This effect can be triggered once every 0.5s and can be triggered even if said character is not on the field. When you possess 2 Sigils of Rebellion, all of them will be consumed and all nearby party members will obtain "Millennial Movement: Song of Resistance" for 12s. "Millennial Movement: Song of Resistance" increases Normal, Charged and Plunging Attack DMG by {1} and increases ATK by {2}. Once this effect is triggered, you will not gain Sigils of Rebellion for 20s. Of the many effects of the "Millennial Movement," buffs of the same type will not stack.

frostbearer.name: Frostbearer
frostbearer.description: A fruit that possesses a strange, frosty will. A faint sense of agony emanates from it.
frostbearer.effect: Hitting an opponent with Normal and Charged Attacks has a {0} chance of forming and dropping an Everfrost Icicle above them, dealing AoE DMG equal to {1} of ATK. Opponents affected by Cryo are instead dealt DMG equal to {2} of ATK. Can only occur once every 10s.

hakushinring.name: Hakushin Ring
hakushinring.description: A catalyst that carries the memory of the Kitsune Saiguu of ancient times. However, this device is but an impoverished vessel for the full breadth of her thought.
hakushinring.effect: After the character equipped with this weapon triggers an Electro elemental reaction, nearby party members of an Elemental Type involved in the elemental reaction receive a {0} Elemental DMG Bonus for their element, lasting 6s. Elemental Bonuses gained in this way cannot be stacked.

ascend1.name: Coral Branch of a Distant Sea

ascend2.name: Jeweled Branch of a Distant Sea

ascend3.name: Jeweled Branch of a Distant Sea

ascend4.name: Jade Branch of a Distant Sea

ascend5.name: Jade Branch of a Distant Sea

ascend6.name: Golden Branch of a Distant Sea

halberd.name: Halberd
halberd.description: A polearm with an axe blade mounted on top that can deal quite a lot of damage. It's favored by the Millelith officers.
halberd.effect: Normal Attacks deal an additional {0} ATK as DMG. This effect can only occur once every 10s.

hamayumi.name: Hamayumi
hamayumi.description: A certain shrine maiden once owned this warbow. It was made with surpassing skill, and is both intricate and sturdy.
hamayumi.effect: Increases Normal Attack DMG by {0} and Charged Attack DMG by {1}. When the equipping character's Energy reaches 100%, this effect is increased by 100%.

harbingerofdawn.name: Harbinger of Dawn
harbingerofdawn.description: A sword that once shone like the sun. The wielder of this sword will be blessed with a "feel-good" buff. The reflective material on the blade has long worn off.
harbingerofdawn.effect: When HP is above 90%, increases CRIT Rate by {0}.

huntersbow.name: Hunter's Bow
huntersbow.description: A hunter's music consists of but two sounds: the twang of the bowstring and the whoosh of soaring arrows.

ironpoint.name: Iron Point
ironpoint.description: Sharp and pointy at one end, it is a balanced weapon that is quite popular among travelers.

ironsting.name: Iron Sting
ironsting.description: An exotic long-bladed rapier that somehow found its way into Liyue via foreign traders. It is light, agile, and sharp.
ironsting.effect: Dealing Elemental DMG increases all DMG by {0} for 6s. Max 2 stacks. Can occur once every 1s.

katsuragikirinagamasa.name: Katsuragikiri Nagamasa
katsuragikirinagamasa.description: A blade that was once made in Tatarasuna. Heavy and tough.
katsuragikirinagamasa.effect: Increases Elemental Skill DMG by {0}. After Elemental Skill hits an opponent, the character loses 3 Energy but regenerates {1} Energy every 2s for the next 6s. This effect can occur once every 10s. Can be triggered even when the character is not on the field.

kitaincrossspear.name: Kitain Cross Spear
kitaincrossspear.description: A special lance that was once used by a famed warrior who guarded the Tatarigami on Yashiori Island.
kitaincrossspear.effect: Increases Elemental Skill DMG by {0}. After Elemental Skill hits an opponent, the character loses 3 Energy but regenerates {1} Energy every 2s for the next 6s. This effect can occur once every 10s. Can be triggered even when the character is not on the field.

lionsroar.name: Lion's Roar
lionsroar.description: A sharp blade with extravagant carvings that somehow does not compromise on durability and sharpness. It roars like a lion as it cuts through the air.
lionsroar.effect: Increases DMG against opponents affected by Pyro or Electro by {0}.

lithicblade.name: Lithic Blade
lithicblade.description: A greatsword carved and chiseled from the very bedrock of Liyue.
lithicblade.effect: For every character in the party who hails from Liyue, the character who equips this weapon gains a {0} ATK increase and a {1} CRIT Rate increase. This effect stacks up to 4 times.

lithicspear.name: Lithic Spear
lithicspear.description: A spear forged from the rocks of the Guyun Stone Forest. Its hardness knows no equal.
lithicspear.effect: For every character in the party who hails from Liyue, the character who equips this weapon gains a {0} ATK increase and a {1} CRIT Rate increase. This effect stacks up to 4 times.

lostprayertothesacredwinds.name: Lost Prayer to the Sacred Winds
lostprayertothesacredwinds.description: An educational tome written by anonymous early inhabitants who worshiped the wind. It has been blessed by the wind for its faithfulness and influence over the millennia.
lostprayertothesacredwinds.effect: Increases Movement SPD by 10%. When in battle, gain a {0} Elemental DMG Bonus every 4s. Max 4 stacks. Lasts until the character falls or leaves combat.

luxurioussealord.name: Luxurious Sea-Lord
luxurioussealord.description: The great king of the ocean. Having been air-dried, it makes for a fine weapon as well as emergency sustenance.
luxurioussealord.effect: Increases Elemental Burst DMG by {0}. When Elemental Burst hits opponents, there is a 100% chance of summoning a huge onrush of tuna that deals {1} ATK as AoE DMG. This effect can occur once every 15s.

magicguide.name: Magic Guide
magicguide.description: Version 12. A reprint featuring corrections to Version 11 and brand-new additions based on recent developments.
magicguide.effect: Increases DMG against opponents affected by Hydro or Electro by {0}.

mappamare.name: Mappa Mare
mappamare.description: A nautical chart featuring nearby currents and climates that somehow found its way into Liyue via foreign traders.
mappamare.effect: Triggering an Elemental reaction grants a {0} Elemental DMG Bonus for 10s. Max 2 stacks.

memoryofdust.name: Memory of Dust
memoryofdust.description: A stone dumbbell containing distant memories. Its endless transformations reveal the power within.
memoryofdust.effect: Increases Shield Strength by {0}. Scoring hits on opponents increases ATK by {1} for 8s. Max 5 stacks. Can only occur once every 0.3s. While protected by a shield, this ATK increase effect is increased by 100%.

messenger.name: Messenger
messenger.description: A basic wooden bow. It is said to have once been used as a tool for long-distance communication.
messenger.effect: Charged Attack hits on weak points deal an additional {0} ATK DMG as CRIT DMG. Can only occur once every 10s.

mistsplitterreforged.name: Mistsplitter Reforged
mistsplitterreforged.description: A sword that blazes with a fierce violet light. The name "Reforged" comes from it having been broken once before.
mistsplitterreforged.effect: Gain a {0} Elemental DMG Bonus for all elements and receive the might of the Mistsplitter's Emblem. At stack levels 1/2/3, the Mistsplitter's Emblem provides a {1} Elemental DMG Bonus for the character's Elemental Type. The character will obtain 1 stack of the Mistsplitter's Emblem in each of the following scenarios: Normal Attack deals Elemental DMG (stack lasts 5s), casting Elemental Burst (stack lasts 10s); Energy is less than 100% (stack disappears when Energy is full). Each stack's duration is calculated independently.

ascend1.name: Coral Branch of a Distant Sea

ascend2.name: Jeweled Branch of a Distant Sea

ascend3.name: Jeweled Branch of a Distant Sea

ascend4.name: Jade Branch of a Distant Sea

ascend5.name: Jade Branch of a Distant Sea

ascend6.name: Golden Branch of a Distant Sea

mitternachtswaltz.name: Mitternachts Waltz
mitternachtswaltz.description: A bow painted the color of transgression and nights of illusion.
mitternachtswaltz.effect: Normal Attack hits on opponents increase Elemental Skill DMG by {0} for 5s. Elemental Skill hits on opponents increase Normal Attack DMG by {1} for 5s.

mouunsmoon.name: Mouun's Moon
mouunsmoon.description: A lovely warbow made from seashells and coral. A mournful brilliance flows along its moonlight-colored arms.
mouunsmoon.effect: For every point of the entire party's combined maximum Energy capacity, the Elemental Burst DMG of the character equipping this weapon is increased by {0}. A maximum of {1} increased Elemental Burst DMG can be achieved this way.

oldmercspal.name: Old Merc's Pal
oldmercspal.description: A battle-tested greatsword that has seen better days and worse.

otherworldlystory.name: Otherworldly Story
otherworldlystory.description: A cheap fantasy novel with no value whatsoever. Any claim that it possesses the power of catalysis is also pure fantasy.
otherworldlystory.effect: Each Elemental Orb or Particle collected restores {0} HP.

pocketgrimoire.name: Pocket Grimoire
pocketgrimoire.description: A carefully compiled notebook featuring the essentials needed to pass a magic exam.

polarstar.name: Polar Star
polarstar.description: A pristine bow that is as sharp as the glaciers of the far north.
polarstar.effect: Elemental Skill and Elemental Burst DMG increased by {0}. After a Normal Attack, Charged Attack, Elemental Skill or Elemental Burst hits an opponent, 1 stack of Ashen Nightstar will be gained for 12s. When 1/2/3/4 stacks of Ashen Nightstar are present, ATK is increased by {1}. The stack of Ashen Nightstar created by the Normal Attack, Charged Attack, Elemental Skill or Elemental Burst will be counted independently of the others.

predator.name: Predator
predator.description: A uniquely-designed bow. This should not belong in this world.
predator.effect:
Effective only on the following platform: 
"PlayStation Network"
Dealing Cryo DMG to opponents increases this character's Normal and Charged Attack DMG by 10% for 6s. This effect can have a maximum of 2 stacks. Additionally, when Aloy equips Predator, ATK is increased by 66.

primordialjadecutter.name: Primordial Jade Cutter
primordialjadecutter.description: A ceremonial sword masterfully carved from pure jade. There almost seems to be an audible sigh in the wind as it is swung.
primordialjadecutter.effect: HP increased by {0}. Additionally, provides an ATK Bonus based on {1} of the wielder's Max HP.

primordialjadewingedspear.name: Primordial Jade Winged-Spear
primordialjadewingedspear.description: A jade polearm made by the archons, capable of slaying ancient beasts.
primordialjadewingedspear.effect: On hit, increases ATK by {0} for 6s. Max 7 stacks. This effect can only occur once every 0.3s. While in possession of the maximum possible stacks, DMG dealt is increased by {1}.

prototypeamber.name: Prototype Amber
prototypeamber.description: A dully gilded catalyst secretly guarded in the Blackcliff Forge. It seems to glow with the very light from the sky.
prototypeamber.effect: Using an Elemental Burst regenerates {0} Energy every 2s for 6s. All party members will regenerate {1} HP every 2s for this duration.

prototypearchaic.name: Prototype Archaic
prototypearchaic.description: An ancient greatsword discovered in the Blackcliff Forge. It swings with such an immense force that one feels it could cut straight through reality itself.
prototypearchaic.effect: On hit, Normal or Charged Attacks have a 50% chance to deal an additional {0} ATK DMG to opponents within a small AoE. Can only occur once every 15s.

prototypecrescent.name: Prototype Crescent
prototypecrescent.description: A prototype longbow discovered in the Blackcliff Forge. The arrow fired from this bow glimmers like a ray of moonlight.
prototypecrescent.effect: Charged Attack hits on weak points increase Movement SPD by 10% and ATK by {0} for 10s.

prototyperancour.name: Prototype Rancour
prototyperancour.description: An ancient longsword discovered in the Blackcliff Forge that cuts through rocks like a hot knife through butter.
prototyperancour.effect: On hit, Normal or Charged Attacks increase ATK and DEF by {0} for 6s. Max 4 stacks. This effect can only occur once every 0.3s.

prototypestarglitter.name: Prototype Starglitter
prototypestarglitter.description: A hooked spear discovered hidden away in the Blackcliff Forge. The glimmers along the sharp edge are like stars in the night.
prototypestarglitter.effect: After using an Elemental Skill, increases Normal and Charged Attack DMG by {0} for 12s. Max 2 stacks.

quartz.name: Quartz
quartz.description: A simple but heavy greatsword made of polished black quartz with a golden gilt. It has an air of elegance and dignity about it.
quartz.effect: Upon causing an Overloaded, Melt, Burning, Vaporize, or a Pyro-infused Swirl reaction, ATK is increased by {0} for 12s.

rainslasher.name: Rainslasher
rainslasher.description: A fluorescent greatsword with no sharp edge that crushes enemies with brute force and raw power.
rainslasher.effect: Increases DMG against opponents affected by Hydro or Electro by {0}.

ravenbow.name: Raven Bow
ravenbow.description: Ravens are known to be the ferrymen of the dead. This bow's limb is decorated with raven feathers, which forebode the imminent death of its target.
ravenbow.effect: Increases DMG against opponents affected by Hydro or Pyro by {0}.

recurvebow.name: Recurve Bow
recurvebow.description: It is said that this bow can shoot down eagles in flight, but ultimately how true that is depends on the skill of the archer.

royalbow.name: Royal Bow
royalbow.description: An old longbow that belonged to the erstwhile aristocratic rulers of Mondstadt. Countless generations later, the bowstring is still tight and can still fire arrows with great force.
royalbow.effect: Upon damaging an opponent, increases CRIT Rate by {0}. Max 5 stacks. A CRIT Hit removes all stacks.

royalgreatsword.name: Royal Greatsword
royalgreatsword.description: An old greatsword that belonged to the erstwhile rulers of Mondstadt. It is made from the finest-quality materials and has stood the test of time. A weapon for use by the nobility only.
royalgreatsword.effect: Upon damaging an opponent, increases CRIT Rate by {0}. Max 5 stacks. A CRIT Hit removes all stacks.

royalgrimoire.name: Royal Grimoire
royalgrimoire.description: A book that once belonged to a court mage of Mondstadt who served the nobility. It contains faithful and comprehensive historical accounts as well as magic spells.
royalgrimoire.effect: Upon damaging an opponent, increases CRIT Rate by {0}. Max 5 stacks. A CRIT Hit removes all stacks.

royallongsword.name: Royal Longsword
royallongsword.description: An old longsword that belonged to the erstwhile rulers of Mondstadt. Exquisitely crafted, the carvings and embellishments testify to the stature of its owner.
royallongsword.effect: Upon damaging an opponent, increases CRIT Rate by {0}. Max 5 stacks. A CRIT Hit removes all stacks.

royalspear.name: Royal Spear
royalspear.description: This polearm was once cherished by a member of the old nobility that governed Mondstadt long ago. Although it has never seen the light of day, it is still incomparably sharp.
royalspear.effect: Upon damaging an opponent, increases CRIT Rate by {0}. Max 5 stacks. A CRIT Hit removes all stacks.

rust.name: Rust
rust.description: A completely rusted iron greatbow. The average person would lack the strength to even lift it, let alone fire it.
rust.effect: Increases Normal Attack DMG by {0} but decreases Charged Attack DMG by 10%.

sacrificialbow.name: Sacrificial Bow
sacrificialbow.description: A ceremonial hunting bow that has become petrified over time. The trinkets on it are still visible. It grants the wielder the power to withstand the winds of time.
sacrificialbow.effect: After damaging an opponent with an Elemental Skill, the skill has a {0} chance to end its own CD. Can only occur once every {1}.

sacrificialfragments.name: Sacrificial Fragments
sacrificialfragments.description: A weathered script, the text of which is no longer legible. A cursed item eroded by the winds of time.
sacrificialfragments.effect: After damaging an opponent with an Elemental Skill, the skill has a {0} chance to end its own CD. Can only occur once every {1}.

sacrificialgreatsword.name: Sacrificial Greatsword
sacrificialgreatsword.description: A ceremonial greatsword that has become petrified over time. The trinkets on it are still visible. It grants the wielder the power to withstand the winds of time.
sacrificialgreatsword.effect: After damaging an opponent with an Elemental Skill, the skill has a {0} chance to end its own CD. Can only occur once every {1}.

sacrificialsword.name: Sacrificial Sword
sacrificialsword.description: A ceremonial sword that has become petrified over time. The trinkets on it are still visible. It grants the wielder the power to withstand the winds of time.
sacrificialsword.effect: After damaging an opponent with an Elemental Skill, the skill has a {0} chance to end its own CD. Can only occur once every {1}.

seasonedhuntersbow.name: Seasoned Hunter's Bow
seasonedhuntersbow.description: A bow that has been well-polished by time and meticulously cared for by its owner. It feels almost like an extension of the archer's arm.

serpentspine.name: Serpent Spine
serpentspine.description: A rare weapon whose origin is the ancient ocean. One can hear the sound of the ageless waves as one swings it.
serpentspine.effect: Every 4s a character is on the field, they will deal {0} more DMG and take {1} more DMG. This effect has a maximum of 5 stacks and will not be reset if the character leaves the field, but will be reduced by 1 stack when the character takes DMG.

sharpshootersoath.name: Sharpshooter's Oath
sharpshootersoath.description: This superior bow once belonged to a master archer. However, it gives off a strong scent, thus making it unsuitable for hunting.
sharpshootersoath.effect: Increases DMG against weak spots by {0}.

silversword.name: Silver Sword
silversword.description: A sword for exorcising demons. Everyone knows it's made of a silver alloy, not pure silver.

skyridergreatsword.name: Skyrider Greatsword
skyridergreatsword.description: A reliable steel sword. The legendary Skyrider once tried to ride it as a flying sword... for the second time.
skyridergreatsword.effect: On hit, Normal or Charged Attacks increase ATK by {0} for 6s. Max 4 stacks. Can occur once every 0.5s.

skyridersword.name: Skyrider Sword
skyridersword.description: A reliable steel sword. The legendary Skyrider once tried to ride it as a flying sword...
skyridersword.effect: Using an Elemental Burst grants a {0} increase in ATK and Movement SPD for 15s.

skywardatlas.name: Skyward Atlas
skywardatlas.description: A cloud atlas symbolizing Dvalin and his former master, the Anemo Archon. It details the winds and clouds of the northern regions and contains the powers of the sky and wind.
skywardatlas.effect: Increases Elemental DMG Bonus by {0}. Normal Attack hits have a 50% chance to earn the favor of the clouds, which actively seek out nearby opponents to attack for 15s, dealing {1} ATK DMG. Can only occur once every 30s.

skywardblade.name: Skyward Blade
skywardblade.description: The sword of a knight that symbolizes the restored honor of Dvalin. The blessings of the Anemo Archon rest on the fuller of the blade, imbuing the sword with the powers of the sky and the wind.
skywardblade.effect: CRIT Rate increased by {0}. Gains Skypiercing Might upon using an Elemental Burst: Increases Movement SPD by {1}, increases ATK SPD by {2}, and Normal and Charged hits deal additional DMG equal to {3} of ATK. Skypiercing Might lasts for 12s.

skywardharp.name: Skyward Harp
skywardharp.description: A greatbow that symbolizes Dvalin's affiliation with the Anemo Archon. The sound of the bow firing is music to the Anemo Archon's ears. It contains the power of the sky and wind within.
skywardharp.effect: Increases CRIT DMG by {0}. Hits have a {1} chance to inflict a small AoE attack, dealing 125% Physical ATK DMG. Can only occur once every {2}.

skywardpride.name: Skyward Pride
skywardpride.description: A claymore that symbolizes the pride of Dvalin soaring through the skies. When swung, it emits a deep hum as the full force of Dvalin's command of the sky and the wind is unleashed.
skywardpride.effect: Increases all DMG by {0}. After using an Elemental Burst, Normal or Charged Attack, on hit, creates a vacuum blade that does {1} of ATK as DMG to opponents along its path. Lasts for 20s or 8 vacuum blades.

skywardspine.name: Skyward Spine
skywardspine.description: A polearm that symbolizes Dvalin's firm resolve. The upright shaft of this weapon points towards the heavens, clad in the might of sky and wind.
skywardspine.effect: Increases CRIT Rate by {0} and increases Normal ATK SPD by {1}. Additionally, Normal and Charged Attacks hits on opponents have a {2} chance to trigger a vacuum blade that deals {3} of ATK as DMG in a small AoE. This effect can occur no more than once every 2s.

slingshot.name: Slingshot
slingshot.description: A bow, despite the name. After countless experiments and improvements to the design, the creator of the ultimate slingshot found himself to have made what was actually a bow.
slingshot.effect: If a Normal or Charged Attack hits a target within 0.3s of being fired, increases DMG by {0}. Otherwise, decreases DMG by 10%.

snowtombedstarsilver.name: Snow-Tombed Starsilver
snowtombedstarsilver.description: An ancient greatsword that was stored between frescoes. Forged from Starsilver, it has the power to cleave through ice and snow.
snowtombedstarsilver.effect: Hitting an opponent with Normal and Charged Attacks has a {0} chance of forming and dropping an Everfrost Icicle above them, dealing AoE DMG equal to {1} of ATK. Opponents affected by Cryo are instead dealt DMG equal to {2} of ATK. Can only occur once every 10s.

solarpearl.name: Solar Pearl
solarpearl.description: A dull, golden pearl made of an unknown substance that harbors the light of the sun and the moon and pulses with a warm strength.
solarpearl.effect: Normal Attack hits increase Elemental Skill and Elemental Burst DMG by {0} for 6s. Likewise, Elemental Skill or Elemental Burst hits increase Normal Attack DMG by {1} for 6s.

songofbrokenpines.name: Song of Broken Pines
songofbrokenpines.description: A greatsword as light as the sigh of grass in the breeze, yet as merciless to the corrupt as a typhoon.
songofbrokenpines.effect: A part of the "Millennial Movement" that wanders amidst the winds. Increases ATK by {0}, and when Normal or Charged Attacks hit opponents, the character gains a Sigil of Whispers. This effect can be triggered once every 0.3s. When you possess 4 Sigils of Whispers, all of them will be consumed and all nearby party members will obtain the "Millennial Movement: Banner-Hymn" effect for 12s. "Millennial Movement: Banner-Hymn" increases Normal ATK SPD by {1} and increases ATK by {2}. Once this effect is triggered, you will not gain Sigils of Whispers for 20s. Of the many effects of the "Millennial Movement," buffs of the same type will not stack.

staffofhoma.name: Staff of Homa
staffofhoma.description: A "firewood staff" that was once used in ancient and long-lost rituals.
staffofhoma.effect: HP increased by {0}. Additionally, provides an ATK Bonus based on {1} of the wielder's Max HP. When the wielder's HP is less than 50%, this ATK Bonus is increased by an additional {2} of Max HP.

summitshaper.name: Summit Shaper
summitshaper.description: A symbol of a legendary pact, this sharp blade once cut off the peak of a mountain.
summitshaper.effect: Increases Shield Strength by {0}. Scoring hits on opponents increases ATK by {1} for 8s. Max 5 stacks. Can only occur once every 0.3s. While protected by a shield, this ATK increase effect is increased by 100%.

swordofdescension.name: Sword of Descension
swordofdescension.description: A sword of unique craftsmanship. It does not appear to belong to this world.
swordofdescension.effect:
Effective only on the following platform: 
"PlayStation Network"
Hitting opponents with Normal and Charged Attacks grants a {0} chance to deal {1} ATK as DMG in a small AoE. This effect can only occur once every 10s. Additionally, if the Traveler equips the Sword of Descension, their ATK is increased by {2}.

thealleyflash.name: The Alley Flash
thealleyflash.description: A straight sword as black as the night. It once belonged to a thief who roamed the benighted streets.
thealleyflash.effect: Increases DMG dealt by the character equipping this weapon by {0}. Taking DMG disables this effect for 5s.

thebell.name: The Bell
thebell.description: A heavy greatsword. A clock is embedded within it, though its internal mechanisms have long been damaged.
thebell.effect: Taking DMG generates a shield which absorbs DMG up to {0} of Max HP. This shield lasts for 10s or until broken, and can only be triggered once every {1}. While protected by a shield, the character gains {2} increased DMG.

theblacksword.name: The Black Sword
theblacksword.description: A pitch-black longsword that thirsts for violence and conflict. It is said that this weapon can cause its user to become drunk on the red wine of slaughter.
theblacksword.effect: Increases DMG dealt by Normal and Charged Attacks by {0}. Additionally, regenerates {1} of ATK as HP when Normal and Charged Attacks score a CRIT Hit. This effect can occur once every 5s.

thecatch.name: "The Catch"
thecatch.description: In the distant past, this was the beloved spear of a famed Inazuman bandit.
thecatch.effect: Increases Elemental Burst DMG by {0} and Elemental Burst CRIT Rate by {1}.

theflute.name: The Flute
theflute.description: Beneath its rusty exterior is a lavishly decorated thin blade. It swings as swiftly as the wind.
theflute.effect: Normal or Charged Attacks grant a Harmonic on hits. Gaining 5 Harmonics triggers the power of music and deals {0} ATK DMG to surrounding opponents. Harmonics last up to 30s, and a maximum of 1 can be gained every 0.5s.

thestringless.name: The Stringless
thestringless.description: A bow that once served as an extraordinary instrument. It is no longer capable of getting people up and dancing.
thestringless.effect: Increases Elemental Skill and Elemental Burst DMG by {0}.

theunforged.name: The Unforged
theunforged.description: Capable of driving away evil spirits and wicked people alike, this edgeless claymore seems to possess divine might.
theunforged.effect: Increases Shield Strength by {0}. Scoring hits on opponents increases ATK by {1} for 8s. Max 5 stacks. Can only occur once every 0.3s. While protected by a shield, this ATK increase effect is increased by 100%.

theviridescenthunt.name: The Viridescent Hunt
theviridescenthunt.description: A pure green hunting bow. This once belonged to a certain hunter whose home was the forest.
theviridescenthunt.effect: Upon hit, Normal and Aimed Shot Attacks have a 50% chance to generate a Cyclone, which will continuously attract surrounding opponents, dealing {0} of ATK as DMG to these opponents every 0.5s for 4s. This effect can only occur once every {1}.

thewidsith.name: The Widsith
thewidsith.description: A heavy notebook filled with musical scores. Though suffering from moth damage and heavy wear-and-tear, there is still much power to be found among the hand-written words within.
thewidsith.effect: When the character takes the field, they will gain a random theme song for 10s. This can only occur once every 30s. Recitative: ATK is increased by {0}. Aria: Increases all Elemental DMG by {1}. Interlude: Elemental Mastery is increased by {2}.

thrillingtalesofdragonslayers.name: Thrilling Tales of Dragon Slayers
thrillingtalesofdragonslayers.description: A fictional story of a band of five heroes who go off on a dragon hunt. It is poorly written and structurally incoherent. Its value lies in the many lessons that can be learned from failure.
thrillingtalesofdragonslayers.effect: When switching characters, the new character taking the field has their ATK increased by {0} for 10s. This effect can only occur once every 20s.

thunderingpulse.name: Thundering Pulse
thunderingpulse.description: A longbow that was a gift from the Shogun. Eternal lightning crackles all around it.
thunderingpulse.effect: Increases ATK by {0} and grants the might of the Thunder Emblem. At stack levels 1/2/3, the Thunder Emblem increases Normal Attack DMG by {1}. The character will obtain 1 stack of Thunder Emblem in each of the following scenarios: Normal Attack deals DMG (stack lasts 5s), casting Elemental Skill (stack lasts 10s); Energy is less than 100% (stack disappears when Energy is full). Each stack's duration is calculated independently.

travelershandysword.name: Traveler's Handy Sword
travelershandysword.description: A handy steel sword which contains scissors, a magnifying glass, tinder, and other useful items in its sheath.
travelershandysword.effect: Each Elemental Orb or Particle collected restores {0} HP.

twinnephrite.name: Twin Nephrite
twinnephrite.description: A jade pendant formed by piecing together two jade stones.
twinnephrite.effect: Defeating an opponent increases Movement SPD and ATK by {0} for 15s.

vortexvanquisher.name: Vortex Vanquisher
vortexvanquisher.description: This sharp polearm can seemingly pierce through anything. When swung, one can almost see the rift it tears in the air.
vortexvanquisher.effect: Increases Shield Strength by {0}. Scoring hits on opponents increases ATK by {1} for 8s. Max 5 stacks. Can only occur once every 0.3s. While protected by a shield, this ATK increase effect is increased by 100%.

wastergreatsword.name: Waster Greatsword
wastergreatsword.description: A sturdy sheet of iron that may be powerful enough to break apart mountains if wielded with enough willpower.

wavebreakersfin.name: Wavebreaker's Fin
wavebreakersfin.description: A naginata forged from luminescent material deep in the ocean depths. It was once the possession of the tengu race.
wavebreakersfin.effect: For every point of the entire party's combined maximum Energy capacity, the Elemental Burst DMG of the character equipping this weapon is increased by {0}. A maximum of {1} increased Elemental Burst DMG can be achieved this way.

whiteblind.name: Whiteblind
whiteblind.description: An exotic sword with one section of the blade left blunt. It made its way into Liyue via the hands of foreign traders. Incredibly powerful in the hands of someone who knows how to use it.
whiteblind.effect: On hit, Normal or Charged Attacks increase ATK and DEF by {0} for 6s. Max 4 stacks. This effect can only occur once every 0.5s.

whiteirongreatsword.name: White Iron Greatsword
whiteirongreatsword.description: A claymore made from white iron. Lightweight without compromising on power. Effective even when wielded by one of average strength, it is extremely deadly in the hands of a physically stronger wielder.

whitetassel.name: White Tassel
whitetassel.description: A standard-issue weapon of the Millelith soldiers. It has a sturdy shaft and sharp spearhead. It's a reliable weapon.

windblumeode.name: Windblume Ode
windblumeode.description: A bow adorned with nameless flowers that bears the earnest hopes of an equally nameless person.
windblumeode.effect: After using an Elemental Skill, receive a boon from the ancient wish of the Windblume, increasing ATK by {0} for 6s.

wineandsong.name: Wine and Song
wineandsong.description: A songbook from the bygone aristocratic era, whose composer has become forgotten. It chronicles the tale of a certain heroic outlaw.
wineandsong.effect: Hitting an opponent with a Normal Attack decreases the Stamina consumption of Sprint or Alternate Sprint by {0} for 5s. Additionally, using a Sprint or Alternate Sprint ability increases ATK by {1} for 5s.

wolfsgravestone.name: Wolf's Gravestone
wolfsgravestone.description: A longsword used by the Wolf Knight. Originally just a heavy sheet of iron given to the knight by a blacksmith from the city, it became endowed with legendary power owing to his friendship with the wolves.
wolfsgravestone.effect: Increases ATK by {0}. On hit, attacks against opponents with less than 30% HP increase all party members' ATK by {1} for 12s. Can only occur once every 30s.

adventurer.name: Adventurer
adventurer.4pc: Opening a chest regenerates 30% Max HP over 5s.

flower.name: Adventurer's Flower
flower.description: A resilient flower that survived the harsh environment of an ancient city. It is now proudly worn like a medal.

plume.name: Adventurer's Tail Feather
plume.description: The feather of an exotic bird rarely seen on this continent.

sands.name: Adventurer's Pocket Watch
sands.description: It's easy to lose track of time when you're adventuring where the sun doesn't shine, whether that's the depths of the abyss or the ruins of a lost city.

goblet.name: Adventurer's Golden Goblet
goblet.description: The spoils of one of an adventurer's many expeditions. Though a little damaged, it is still an excellent find.

circlet.name: Adventurer's Bandana
circlet.description: A cloth garment worn at the forehead. Though soaked in sweat and covered in dust, it still beams with an adventurer's pride.

archaicpetra.name: Archaic Petra
archaicpetra.4pc: Upon obtaining an Elemental Shard created through a Crystallize Reaction, all party members gain a 35% DMG Bonus for that particular element for 10s. Only one form of Elemental DMG Bonus can be gained in this manner at any one time.

flower.name: Flower of Creviced Cliff
flower.description: A flower born of the minerals and rocks of cliffside cracks. The way its petals blow in the wind makes it seem alive.

plume.name: Feather of Jagged Peaks
plume.description: A hard feather from a large seacliff hawk. The basalt tip of the feather sometimes glistens with a cool dew.

sands.name: Sundial of Enduring Jade
sands.description: A sundial carved from a single, large piece of jade. Its lined with a pattern that silently records the passage of time.

goblet.name: Goblet of Chiseled Crag
goblet.description: A resplendent yet dignified wine goblet, once filled to the brim in an era long gone.

circlet.name: Mask of Solitude Basalt
circlet.description: A solemn mask exquisitely carved from basalt. Its hollow eyes stare ahead expressionless and cold.

berserker.name: Berserker
berserker.4pc: When HP is below 70%, CRIT Rate increases by an additional 24%.

flower.name: Berserker's Rose
flower.description: An exquisite flower that has been dyed red. It represents the qualities of the Berserker.

plume.name: Berserker's Indigo Feather
plume.description: An indigo feather from a legendary raven, part of which has been dyed crimson red.

sands.name: Berserker's Timepiece
sands.description: An instrument with an eternal flow that continues mercilessly within, reminding the Berserker of the limited time he has left — both on the battlefield as well as in the world.

goblet.name: Berserker's Bone Goblet
goblet.description: A goblet made from the bone of an unknown beast. It was taken as a trophy after some deadly encounter.

circlet.name: Berserker's Battle Mask
circlet.description: A hideous iron mask that has been left half-shattered from vicious battles.

blizzardstrayer.name: Blizzard Strayer
blizzardstrayer.4pc: When a character attacks an opponent affected by Cryo, their CRIT Rate is increased by 20%. If the opponent is Frozen, CRIT Rate is increased by an additional 20%.

flower.name: Snowswept Memory
flower.description: A long-extinct flower, covered in beads of frost, that once grew on the glaciers. There was a time when even the proudest and most arrogant warriors bowed before it.

plume.name: Icebreaker's Resolve
plume.description: A feather that exudes a chilly aura. One can almost feel the turbulent winds that brought it here, wailing over snow-covered plains and between frosty peaks.

sands.name: Frozen Homeland's Demise
sands.description: A timepiece from a nation of old that waited for their warriors' return. What flows inside is not sand, but bits of ice that never melt.

goblet.name: Frost-Weaved Dignity
goblet.description: A cup carved out of ice that is as chilly and biting as winter. Its former master would drink an unfreezable liquor from it.

circlet.name: Broken Rime's Echo
circlet.description: The crown of an ancient hero who dreamt of conquering the cold. It is proof of its former master's bravery in facing the bone-chilling cold of winter.

bloodstainedchivalry.name: Bloodstained Chivalry
bloodstainedchivalry.4pc: After defeating an opponent, increases Charged Attack DMG by 50%, and reduces its Stamina cost to 0 for 10s.

flower.name: Bloodstained Flower of Iron
flower.description: A dried flower stained black with blood and now as hard as steel. Probably some sort of a memento for its former master.

plume.name: Bloodstained Black Plume
plume.description: A raven feather pinned to a knight's cape. Countless bloodstains have dyed it pitch black.

sands.name: Bloodstained Final Hour
sands.description: A timepiece once used by a knight. The liquid inside has dried up, rendering it useless.

goblet.name: Bloodstained Chevalier's Goblet
goblet.description: The dark metallic vessel owned by the Bloodstained Knight. Its exterior has been stained as black as the night by smoke and coagulated blood.

circlet.name: Bloodstained Iron Mask
circlet.description: The iron mask the knight used to conceal their identity. Many have speculated about the face behind the mask.

braveheart.name: Brave Heart
braveheart.4pc: Increases DMG by 30% against opponents with more than 50% HP.

flower.name: Medal of the Brave
flower.description: A simple flower brooch that is a keepsake from someone's first adventure.

plume.name: Prospect of the Brave
plume.description: A shimmering feather from a songbird that brings a nudge of courage to its wearer.

sands.name: Fortitude of the Brave
sands.description: A dated miniature hourglass that serves no practical purpose. It seems as elusive as time itself.

goblet.name: Outset of the Brave
goblet.description: A crude wooden vessel filled only with memories.

circlet.name: Crown of the Brave
circlet.description: A rough-and-ready laurel wreath that seems as precious as a king's golden crown.

crimsonwitchofflames.name: Crimson Witch of Flames
crimsonwitchofflames.4pc: Increases Overloaded and Burning DMG by 40%. Increases Vaporize and Melt DMG by 15%. Using Elemental Skill increases the 2-Piece Set Bonus by 50% of its starting value for 10s. Max 3 stacks.

flower.name: Witch's Flower of Blaze
flower.description: A flower touched by the witch who once dreamt of burning away all the demons in the world. The anonymous flames affectionately caress the hands of those who touch it.

plume.name: Witch's Ever-Burning Plume
plume.description: A bird feather touched by the witch who once dreamt of burning away all the demons in the world. Its eternal flame burns hot.

sands.name: Witch's End Time
sands.description: A timepiece worn by the witch who dreamt of burning away all the demons in the world. The years the witch dedicated to the flames flow within.

goblet.name: Witch's Heart Flames
goblet.description: A flame-spitting urn left behind by the Crimson Witch of Flames, who once dreamt of burning away all the demons in the world. The fire in the urn burns eternally, as did its former master.

circlet.name: Witch's Scorching Hat
circlet.description: A hat once worn by the witch who dreamt of burning away all of the demons in the world. The large brim blocked her sight.

defenderswill.name: Defender's Will
defenderswill.4pc: For each different element present in your own party, the wearer's Elemental RES to that corresponding element is increased by 30%.

flower.name: Guardian's Flower
flower.description: An iris that was cherished by the guardian. Unfortunately, the chance never came for it to be given to whom the guardian loved.

plume.name: Guardian's Sigil
plume.description: A feather-shaped brooch that symbolizes someone’s yearning to defend others like a shield.

sands.name: Guardian's Clock
sands.description: A small timekeeping gadget. On moonless nights, it was the only way its former owner could know the time.

goblet.name: Guardian's Vessel
goblet.description: A metal vessel that can be filled with a drink to dispel the loneliness of the long watch.

circlet.name: Guardian's Band
circlet.description: A fabric band dyed indigo by the darkness of night. Can also double as a bandage in the event of an emergency.

emblemofseveredfate.name: Emblem of Severed Fate
emblemofseveredfate.4pc: Increases Elemental Burst DMG by 25% of Energy Recharge. A maximum of 75% bonus DMG can be obtained in this way.

flower.name: Magnificent Tsuba
flower.description: Legends hold that this ornate hand guard was once fitted upon a sword gifted to the oni who betrayed the Shogun.

plume.name: Sundered Feather
plume.description: This was once the black feather of a certain tengu warrior, and was the treasured souvenir of an ancient swordsman.

sands.name: Storm Cage
sands.description: An exquisite seal cage patterned with pansies painted upon a black backdrop, decorated with shining inlaid seashells and intricate gold-work.

goblet.name: Scarlet Vessel
goblet.description: An intricately-designed wine vessel that a world-famous martial artist once drank from.

circlet.name: Ornate Kabuto
circlet.description: A sturdy and hard helmet worn as armor by a noble samurai.

gambler.name: Gambler
gambler.4pc: Defeating an opponent has a 100% chance to remove Elemental Skill CD. Can only occur once every 15s.

flower.name: Gambler's Brooch
flower.description: A big, luxurious flower that can hide loaded dice.

plume.name: Gambler's Feather Accessory
plume.description: The tail feather of a large bird. Perfect for discretely concealing a trump card.

sands.name: Gambler's Pocket Watch
sands.description: A shattered pocket watch that once took a lethal hit for its owner.

goblet.name: Gambler's Dice Cup
goblet.description: This vessel was specially made for a single purpose. It has absolutely no secret compartments built into it.

circlet.name: Gambler's Earrings
circlet.description: A pair of blue earrings that, when worn, calm the mind and encourage a rational assessment of risks.

glacierandsnowfield.name: Glacier and Snowfield
glacierandsnowfield.4pc: Increases Superconduct DMG by 100%. Increases Melt DMG by 15%. Using an Elemental Burst increases Cryo DMG Bonus by 30% for 10s.

flower.name: Heart of Frost
flower.description: A flower that has been frozen in time from the moment it was picked. The knight kept it as a memento forever after.

plume.name: Plume of Snow
plume.description: A bird feather that was picked up by the knight who walked with the North Wind in the snow. It still awaits the day when it will thaw.

sands.name: Glacial Sand
sands.description: A timepiece once used by the knight who walked with the North Wind. A never-ending snowstorm rages within.

goblet.name: Goblet of Aquilo
goblet.description: A goblet of eonothem left behind by the knight who walked with the North Wind. The chill of the bitter winter frost still lingers within.

circlet.name: Crown of Glacier
circlet.description: The crown worn by the knight who walked with the North Wind. It was forged using winter ice and silver.

gladiatorsfinale.name: Gladiator's Finale
gladiatorsfinale.4pc: If the wielder of this artifact set uses a Sword, Claymore or Polearm, increases their Normal Attack DMG by 35%.

flower.name: Gladiator's Nostalgia
flower.description: No one knows why the legendary gladiator wore this flower on his chest. It was the brutal warrior's only weakness.

plume.name: Gladiator's Destiny
plume.description: A feather of dreams that soars free like an eagle. At the end of the gladiator's legendary life, this parting gift was left upon his chest by a bird that knew true freedom.

sands.name: Gladiator's Longing
sands.description: A timepiece that recorded the gladiator's days in the bloodstained Colosseum. To him, it counted down the days on his long road to freedom.

goblet.name: Gladiator's Intoxication
goblet.description: The golden cup a champion gladiator drank from in ancient times. It brimmed with his glory for years until the fateful day of his fall.

circlet.name: Gladiator's Triumphus
circlet.description: The helmet of a legendary gladiator from ancient times, who would proudly stretch out his bloodied arms to welcome the thunderous applause of his audience.

heartofdepth.name: Heart of Depth
heartofdepth.4pc: After using Elemental Skill, increases Normal Attack and Charged Attack DMG by 30% for 15s.

flower.name: Gilded Corsage
flower.description: A mantle brooch that has lost its luster. The gold plating that once adorned it was ground away by the wind and the waves long ago.

plume.name: Gust of Nostalgia
plume.description: A feather carried over by whimpering sea winds and crimson waves. The passage of time has changed its shape and color.

sands.name: Copper Compass
sands.description: An ancient bronze compass. Its needle points towards some ever-distant shore, to a non-existent harbor.

goblet.name: Goblet of Thundering Deep
goblet.description: A faded wine cup that was unintentionally dredged up from the sea. Its dull exterior tells of the days it has spent beneath the waves.

circlet.name: Wine-Stained Tricorne
circlet.description: An ancient, wine-stained sea hat that still reeks of alcohol even now.

instructor.name: Instructor
instructor.4pc: Upon triggering an Elemental Reaction, increases all party members' Elemental Mastery by 120 for 8s.

flower.name: Instructor's Brooch
flower.description: Whenever the instructor wore this brooch, it meant there would be no training sessions that day.

plume.name: Instructor's Feather Accessory
plume.description: Any instructor who has mastered the art of de-escalation knows to keep this accessory firmly in their grasp at all times.

sands.name: Instructor's Pocket Watch
sands.description: A stopwatch used not for general timekeeping but to measure the duration of a training session.

goblet.name: Instructor's Tea Cup
goblet.description: It may seem like an ordinary tea cup to most. But to students, it is the symbol of the instructor's authority.

circlet.name: Instructor's Cap
circlet.description: A standard-issue honorary instructor's cap, only granted to those who turn down a promotion.

lavawalker.name: Lavawalker
lavawalker.4pc: Increases DMG against opponents affected by Pyro by 35%.

flower.name: Lavawalker's Resolution
flower.description: A flower that blooms amidst burning flames. It is said that long ago, a sage once wore it as he walked into a sea of fire.

plume.name: Lavawalker's Salvation
plume.description: The feather of a proud phoenix. You can almost hear the sound of its wings flapping in the scorching flames.

sands.name: Lavawalker's Torment
sands.description: Burning sand flows within this hourglass. Despite the intense heat, the sand leave no mark upon the vessel that houses it.

goblet.name: Lavawalker's Epiphany
goblet.description: A legendary goblet that can withstand extremely high temperatures. It still retains a degree of warmth even though it is now empty.

circlet.name: Lavawalker's Wisdom
circlet.description: The circlet of a sage who traversed a sea of fire. It once shone brightly from their ancient silhouette as they stood strong amidst the flames.

flower.name: Lucky Dog's Clover
flower.description: A four-leaf clover that grows in the wild. It was picked because it is said to bring good luck.

plume.name: Lucky Dog's Eagle Feather
plume.description: A monster once cornered an adventurer, but was then picked off by a hunting eagle... That eagle dropped this feather, which now carries some of the adventurer's good luck.

sands.name: Lucky Dog's Hourglass
sands.description: A broken hourglass from which all the sand has escaped. But it's fine, because the passage of time means nothing to someone without a single worry in the whole world.

goblet.name: Lucky Dog's Goblet
goblet.description: An exquisite metallic vessel that was once used to knock out a thief.

circlet.name: Lucky Dog's Silver Circlet
circlet.description: Its former owner once fell into a cave and found the treasure trove of an exiled royal. This is a souvenir from that incident.

maidenbeloved.name: Maiden Beloved
maidenbeloved.4pc: Using an Elemental Skill or Burst increases healing received by all party members by 20% for 10s.

flower.name: Maiden's Distant Love
flower.description: A fragrant flower that will bloom for all eternity and never wither.

plume.name: Maiden's Heart-stricken Infatuation
plume.description: A feathered accessory that carries the longing for a certain someone, like a migratory bird on the wind.

sands.name: Maiden's Passing Youth
sands.description: The hands of time will never come to an end, but the same cannot not be said for those cherished years of the young maiden's life when she was doted upon.

goblet.name: Maiden's Fleeting Leisure
goblet.description: A vessel made with sweet black tea in mind rather than bitter liquor.

circlet.name: Maiden's Fading Beauty
circlet.description: A meticulously well-maintained woman's hat that keeps wrinkles safely out of sight.

martialartist.name: Martial Artist
martialartist.2pc: Increases Normal Attack and Charged Attack DMG by 15%.
martialartist.4pc: After using Elemental Skill, increases Normal Attack and Charged Attack DMG by 25% for 8s.

flower.name: Martial Artist's Red Flower
flower.description: This particular kind of red flower was the only thing that could alleviate the Martial Artist's pain.

plume.name: Martial Artist's Feather Accessory
plume.description: A common bird feather. Experts use it to practice strength control, while rookies use it to make fans.

sands.name: Martial Artist's Water Hourglass
sands.description: A tool to keep track of time in endurance training. It is more accurate and reliable than a regular hourglass.

goblet.name: Martial Artist's Wine Cup
goblet.description: A rather exquisite wine cup used in pre-combat rituals.

circlet.name: Martial Artist's Bandana
circlet.description: The first lesson as an apprentice: Vigor, Strength, Will. These words are written on the bandana so you'll never forget them.

noblesseoblige.name: Noblesse Oblige
noblesseoblige.4pc: Using an Elemental Burst increases all party members' ATK by 20% for 12s. This effect cannot stack.

flower.name: Royal Flora
flower.description: A satin flower with a glossy finish, fit for an elegant gathering. It still looks as distinguished as it did on the day it was cast aside.

plume.name: Royal Plume
plume.description: A feathered hat accessory worn by the old aristocrats of Mondstadt on hunts. It still stands proudly as if no time has passed.

sands.name: Royal Pocket Watch
sands.description: A pocket watch that once belonged to the old aristocrats of Mondstadt. Passed down from generation to generation, it has witnessed many years of history.

goblet.name: Royal Silver Urn
goblet.description: An ornamental urn that once belonged to the old aristocrats of Mondstadt. Mournful winds seem to echo within its empty interior.

circlet.name: Royal Masque
circlet.description: A masquerade mask worn by the old aristocrats of Mondstadt. Its hollow eyes are fixated on the golden days of the past.

paleflame.name: Pale Flame
paleflame.4pc: When an Elemental Skill hits an opponent, ATK is increased by 9% for 7s. This effect stacks up to 2 times and can be triggered once every 0.3s. Once 2 stacks are reached, the 2-set effect is increased by 100%.

flower.name: Stainless Bloom
flower.description: A hard, blue artificial flower. Its petals shall never wither, nor shall its colors fade.

plume.name: Wise Doctor's Pinion
plume.description: An ominous pinion with edges of unsurpassed keenness. Perhaps it represents an unnaturally uninhibited nature.

sands.name: Moment of Cessation
sands.description: A pocket watch with a cover that cannot be opened. Yet it ticks and tocks away, following the inexorable flow of time.

goblet.name: Surpassing Cup
goblet.description: An intricately-made cup. Its appearance betrays nothing of its age to an observer.

circlet.name: Mocking Mask
circlet.description: A mask that covers the face, hiding one's expression from others.

prayersfordestiny.name: Prayers for Destiny
prayersfordestiny.1pc: Affected by Hydro for 40% less time.

circlet.name: Tiara of Torrents
circlet.description: A tiara worn by those tasked with offering sacrifices in ancient times. Because it was submerged in water year in and year out, it possesses remarkable resistance.

prayersforillumination.name: Prayers for Illumination
prayersforillumination.1pc: Affected by Pyro for 40% less time.

circlet.name: Tiara of Flame
circlet.description: A tiara worn by those tasked with offering sacrifices in ancient times. After being subjected to the dancing sacrificial flames year in and year out, it possesses remarkable resistance.

prayersforwisdom.name: Prayers for Wisdom
prayersforwisdom.1pc: Affected by Electro for 40% less time.

circlet.name: Tiara of Thunder
circlet.description: A tiara worn by those tasked with offering sacrifices in ancient times. Because it harkened to the call of thunder year in and year out, it possesses remarkable resistance.

prayerstospringtime.name: Prayers to Springtime
prayerstospringtime.1pc: Affected by Cryo for 40% less time.

circlet.name: Tiara of Frost
circlet.description: A tiara worn by those tasked with offering sacrifices in ancient times. Because it once weathered years of the icy cold, it possesses remarkable resistance.

prayerstothefirmament.name: Prayers to the Firmament
prayerstothefirmament.1pc: Affected by Anemo for 40% less time.

circlet.name: Tiara of Gales
circlet.description: A tiara worn by those tasked with offering sacrifices in ancient times. Wind once freely flowed through the various openings in the headdress.

resolutionofsojourner.name: Resolution of Sojourner
resolutionofsojourner.4pc: Increases Charged Attack CRIT Rate by 30%.

flower.name: Heart of Comradeship
flower.description: A small cerulean flower with somebody's ribbon pinned to the stem.

plume.name: Feather of Homecoming
plume.description: A blue arrow fletching imbued with the sentiment of travelers that had once faded into the horizon.

sands.name: Sundial of the Sojourner
sands.description: A sundial that has survived the ages, always silently recording the cycles of the sun and moon as they pass through the sky.

goblet.name: Goblet of the Sojourner
goblet.description: A plain porcelain goblet that was once brimming with joyous brews.

circlet.name: Crown of Parting
circlet.description: A reed coronet that emanates the spring breeze.

retracingbolide.name: Retracing Bolide
retracingbolide.4pc: While protected by a shield, gain an additional 40% Normal and Charged Attack DMG.

flower.name: Summer Night's Bloom
flower.description: A man-made flower in eternal bloom. Who knows if there truly is life in there?

plume.name: Summer Night's Finale
plume.description: A well-crafted wooden dart. It will only stop once it has reached its destination.

sands.name: Summer Night's Moment
sands.description: A pocketwatch that has stopped at a certain point in time.

goblet.name: Summer Night's Waterballoon
goblet.description: Water balloons can be seen everywhere during the summer festival, but none are as finely-wrought as this one.

circlet.name: Summer Night's Mask
circlet.description: A popular mask cast in the image of a deity, as described in the legends.

scholar.name: Scholar
